attributes.action: Allow all school children inside at break and lunch times
attributes.additional_details: We feel it is unfair that pupils have to stand outside in the cold to minimise the risk of COVID even thought we spend hours a day with each other in classrooms.
attributes.background: Change COVID rules to allow us inside at break and lunch and not outside in the freezing cold.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual schools.
